page.title: 20SERVICES IN TODDINGTON
page.content: {1 Fire Brigade The Toddington fire station is at Dunstable Road. We have ten full time men, six part time fire men and two trainees. The fire station has two fire engines with ladders,one water tender that holds 8,ooo litres and one fire rescue unit. {2 Police} In Toddington we have one resident beat constable. He patrols Toddington when on duty, but is based at Harlington police station. This is part of 'D' division under the wing of the main Dunstable station. {3 Ambulance service There is no ambulance station in Toddington. In an emergency ambulances travel from Dunstable and take casualties to the casualty department at the Luton and Dunstable hospital.
